name: mininova.org - dark grey redesign
description:
Complete redesign of mininova.org with the same colors etc as style 844. All ads are removed as well.

The icons in the descriptions of torrents and smilies in the comments are from the tango icon set: http://tango.freedesktop.org/Tango_Icon_Gallery

Do also see my style style 1824

Edit 2/2: fixed the comments
Edi 2/6: mod comments fixed too.

@blue2107: yeah, go ahead

discussions.name: Edit: now you need to fix comments made by moderat

Thx for this style!!

I'm not a pro, but it seem
